assessments.status_rationale: CPI (including core YoY for August) is due today; provided news bullets reference PPI and general ‘positive inflation data’ but do not report the CPI figure.
Retail Sales control group for August will be released on 2025-09-17; no result yet.
The SEP and FOMC decision arrive on 2025-09-17; today’s news offers no SEP projections.
Performance window runs from 2025-09-10 close to 2025-09-30 close. Despite a major 9/10 surge in ORCL noted in the news, the outcome depends on end-window closes.
VIX ≥20 by 2025-10-31; no bullet confirms such a reading yet.
USD/CNH ≥7.45 by 2025-10-31; no evidence in today’s bullets of such a close.
Brent ≥$94 by 2025-10-31; no settlement data provided in the bullets.
No report in the bullets of an OFAC designation tied to PRC fentanyl/precursors; deadline is 2025-10-31.
ERA5 September 2025 ranking will be known by the C3S bulletin due by 2025-10-10; no current data.
BTC ≥$68,000 by 2025-10-31; today’s bullets do not cite a price at or above that level.
No advisory noted in the bullets about a critical npm compromise meeting the threshold; deadline is 2025-10-15.
Initial jobless claims ≥240k by 2025-10-31; no claims figure is reported in the bullets.
